actions.text: Measure called up under motion to suspend rules and pass in House.

official_title: A resolution providing for agreeing to the Senate amendments to the House amendments to the bill (S. 1656), to provide for a national program of fisheries research and development, and for other purposes, with amendments.

summary.text: Provides for agreeing to the Senate amendments to the House amendments to S. 1656 (fisheries) with amendments.

titles.title: A resolution providing for agreeing to the Senate amendments to the House amendments to the bill (S. 1656), to provide for a national program of fisheries research and development, and for other purposes, with amendments.
